text.ascii: bhISma uvAca
text.ur: bhīṣma uvāca

text.ascii: sAdhu pazyati vai droNaH kRpaH sAdhv anupazyati
text.ud: साधु पश्यति वै द्रोणः कृपः साध्वनुपश्यति
text.ur: sādhu paśyati vai droṇaḥ kr̥paḥ sādhv anupaśyati

text.ascii: karNas tu kSatradharmeNa yathAvad yoddhum icchati
text.ur: karṇas tu kṣatradharmeṇa yathāvad yoddhum icchati

text.ascii: AcAryo nAbhiSaktavyaH puruSeNa vijAnatA
text.ur: ācāryo nābhiṣaktavyaḥ puruṣeṇa vijānatā

text.ascii: dezakAlau tu saMprekSya yoddhavyam iti me matiH
text.ud: देशकालौ तु संप्रेक्ष्य योद्धव्यमिति मे मतिः
text.ur: deśakālau tu saṁprekṣya yoddhavyam iti me matiḥ

text.ascii: yasya sUryasamAH paJca sapatnAH syuH prahAriNaH
text.ud: यस्य सूर्यसमाः पञ्च सपत्नाः स्युः प्रहारिणः
text.ur: yasya sūryasamāḥ pañca sapatnāḥ syuḥ prahāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: katham abhyudaye teSAM na pramuhyeta paNDitaH
text.ur: katham abhyudaye teṣāṁ na pramuhyeta paṇḍitaḥ

text.ascii: svArthe sarve vimuhyanti ye 'pi dharmavido janAH
text.ud: स्वार्थे सर्वे विमुह्यन्ति येऽपि धर्मविदो जनाः
text.ur: svārthe sarve vimuhyanti ye ’pi dharmavido janāḥ

text.ascii: tasmAd rAjan bravImy eSa vAkyaM te yadi rocate
text.ur: tasmād rājan bravīmy eṣa vākyaṁ te yadi rocate

text.ascii: karNo yad abhyavocan nas tejaHsaMjananAya tat
text.ur: karṇo yad abhyavocan nas tejaḥsaṁjananāya tat

text.ascii: AcAryaputraH kSamatAM mahat kAryam upasthitam
text.ur: ācāryaputraḥ kṣamatāṁ mahat kāryam upasthitam

text.ascii: nAyaM kAlo virodhasya kaunteye samupasthite
text.ur: nāyaṁ kālo virodhasya kaunteye samupasthite

text.ascii: kSantavyaM bhavatA sarvam AcAryeNa kRpeNa ca
text.ur: kṣantavyaṁ bhavatā sarvam ācāryeṇa kr̥peṇa ca

text.ascii: bhavatAM hi kRtAstratvaM yathAditye prabhA tathA
text.ud: भवतां हि कृतास्त्रत्वं यथादित्ये प्रभा तथा
text.ur: bhavatāṁ hi kr̥tāstratvaṁ yathāditye prabhā tathā

text.ascii: yathA candramaso lakSma sarvathA nApakRSyate
text.ur: yathā candramaso lakṣma sarvathā nāpakr̥ṣyate

text.ascii: evaM bhavatsu brAhmaNyaM brahmAstraM ca pratiSThitam
text.ud: एवं भवत्सु ब्राह्मण्यं ब्रह्मास्त्रं च प्रतिष्ठितम्
text.ur: evaṁ bhavatsu brāhmaṇyaṁ brahmāstraṁ ca pratiṣṭhitam

text.ascii: catvAra ekato vedAH kSAtram ekatra dRzyate
text.ur: catvāra ekato vedāḥ kṣātram ekatra dr̥śyate

text.ascii: naitat samastam ubhayaM kasmiMz cid anuzuzrumaH
text.ur: naitat samastam ubhayaṁ kasmiṁś cid anuśuśrumaḥ

text.ascii: anyatra bhAratAcAryAt saputrAd iti me matiH
text.ur: anyatra bhāratācāryāt saputrād iti me matiḥ

text.ascii: brahmAstraM caiva vedAz ca naitad anyatra dRzyate
text.ur: brahmāstraṁ caiva vedāś ca naitad anyatra dr̥śyate

text.ascii: AcAryaputraH kSamatAM nAyaM kAlaH svabhedane
text.ur: ācāryaputraḥ kṣamatāṁ nāyaṁ kālaḥ svabhedane

text.ascii: sarve saMhatya yudhyAmaH pAkazAsanim Agatam
text.ur: sarve saṁhatya yudhyāmaḥ pākaśāsanim āgatam

text.ascii: balasya vyasanAnIha yAny uktAni manISibhiH
text.ur: balasya vyasanānīha yāny uktāni manīṣibhiḥ

text.ascii: mukhyo bhedo hi teSAM vai pApiSTho viduSAM mataH
text.ud: मुख्यो भेदो हि तेषां वै पापिष्ठो विदुषां मतः
text.ur: mukhyo bhedo hi teṣāṁ vai pāpiṣṭho viduṣāṁ mataḥ

text.ascii: azvatthAmovAca
text.ur: aśvatthāmovāca

text.ascii: AcArya eva kSamatAM zAntir atra vidhIyatAm
text.ur: ācārya eva kṣamatāṁ śāntir atra vidhīyatām

text.ascii: abhiSajyamAne hi gurau tadvRttaM roSakAritam
text.ur: abhiṣajyamāne hi gurau tadvr̥ttaṁ roṣakāritam

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tato duryodhano droNaM kSamayAm Asa bhArata
text.ur: tato duryodhano droṇaṁ kṣamayām āsa bhārata

text.ascii: saha karNena bhISmeNa kRpeNa ca mahAtmanA
text.ud: सह कर्णेन भीष्मेण कृपेण च महात्मना
text.ur: saha karṇena bhīṣmeṇa kr̥peṇa ca mahātmanā

text.ascii: droNa uvAca
text.ur: droṇa uvāca

text.ascii: yad eva prathamaM vAkyaM bhISmaH zAMtanavo 'bravIt
text.ur: yad eva prathamaṁ vākyaṁ bhīṣmaḥ śāṁtanavo ’bravīt

text.ascii: tenaivAhaM prasanno vai param atra vidhIyatAm
text.ur: tenaivāhaṁ prasanno vai param atra vidhīyatām

text.ascii: yathA duryodhane 'yatte nAgaH spRzati sainikAn
text.ur: yathā duryodhane ’yatte nāgaḥ spr̥śati sainikān

text.ascii: sAhasAd yadi vA mohAt tathA nItir vidhIyatAm
text.ur: sāhasād yadi vā mohāt tathā nītir vidhīyatām

text.ascii: vanavAse hy anirvRtte darzayen na dhanaMjayaH
text.ur: vanavāse hy anirvr̥tte darśayen na dhanaṁjayaḥ

text.ascii: dhanaM vAlabhamAno 'tra nAdya naH kSantum arhati
text.ur: dhanaṁ vālabhamāno ’tra nādya naḥ kṣantum arhati

text.ascii: yathA nAyaM samAyujyAd dhArtarASTrAn kathaM cana
text.ur: yathā nāyaṁ samāyujyād dhārtarāṣṭrān kathaṁ cana

text.ascii: yathA ca na parAjayyAt tathA nItir vidhIyatAm
text.ur: yathā ca na parājayyāt tathā nītir vidhīyatām

text.ascii: uktaM duryodhanenApi purastAd vAkyam IdRzam
text.ur: uktaṁ duryodhanenāpi purastād vākyam īdr̥śam

text.ascii: tad anusmRtya gAGgeya yathAvad vaktum arhasi
text.ur: tad anusmr̥tya gāṅgeya yathāvad vaktum arhasi
